


[GROUP TASK #23:]{.small} Job Description for a Research Assistant

Congratulations! You have just won a five-year grant for $200,000.
This will allow you to hire a full-time research assistant for five
years.

Make a detailed list describing the background, skills, and knowledge
of your ideal research assistant. Consult with others about
possibilities, but tailor your list so that it addesses your personal
research interests and goals.
